resources.string: Commander is a hybrid mobile application that joins both the Android OS and the Arduino prototyping platform.
It was designed to interface with the HC-06 Bluetooth transceiver, a communication module typically used in open-hardware and open-source based projects.
Commander is not only Lego friendly, but it encourages the use of Lego blocks. The Bluetooth vehicle utilized for development and testing is Lego based.
For students and professionals alike, Commander can be a useful tool for prototyping, development and experimentation.
